abstract: Wal-Mart Stores released a “comprehensive report of its sustainability efforts”  on Thursday. But the document could more accurately be described as a citizenship report.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores released a “comprehensive report of its sustainability efforts”  on Thursday. But the document could more accurately be described as a citizenship report.
lead_paragraph: Officially, Wal-Mart Stores released a “comprehensive report of its sustainability efforts” yesterday. But the much-anticipated document could more accurately be described as a citizenship report.
